title: The complexity of classifying continuous t-norms up to isomorphism
authors: Jialiang He, Lili Shen, Yi Zhou
abstract:
It is shown that the isomorphism relation between continuous t-norms is Borel
bireducible with the relation of order isomorphism between linear orders on the
set of natural numbers, and therefore, it is Borel bireducible with every Borel
complete equivalence relation.
